entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
